mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. The table of contents lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Chasing Women" and "Perry's Mixer" ROUND DANCES "Lazy Two-Step" and "Neapolitan Waltz" SPECIAL FEATURES "Accents for Fun", "The Butterfly Ball", "Square Dancing Keeps 'Em Young, J. Gardner", "Caller Round-up", "'Big D' Makes Ready", and "Asilomar Dates". The regular features in this edition include "As I See It", "The Square Dance Picture", "Square of the Month", "'Round the Outside Ring", "The Green Sheet", "From the Floor", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
